Html:
Hi!

I need some help to locate the part of documentation that describes how to handle transition between UI elements in regions.

For instance, lets say that I have 3 regions on my main page.

First I want to display a login usercontrol and after user logs in to hide it and display some module in the central region. When the user clicks something there I want the other two regions to be filled with two other modules.

Hi,

If you want to investigate about this topic in the documentation, you can visit the following articles:

  • UIComposition
  • How to inject a view in a region using ViewInjection
  • How to inject a view in a regio using ViewDiscovery

You may want to check out the following answer in the forum:

  • Show login modal form before

Also, if the above is related to what you are looking for, you could check out the View Injection and View Discovery Quickstarts.

In Erwin Vandervalk’s blog you can find a post that might be helpful.

I hope you can find this answer helpful.

Fernando Antivero 
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
Can you please fix the 'View Discovery' link. It's broken.
